# [Interview #1163: Shadows of Self - San Francisco, Entry #39](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1163#39)

#### Question

Is crem spren poop? Or at least… not literally, but something like it?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, it’s more like Shard poop. (Somewhat unsure sounding?
